movie1.title: What/If
movie1.imageDescription: A smirking blonde woman in a white dress (Renee Zellweger) sits in a curved, chic chair.  Beside her is a table bearing a glass pitcher of water.

movie2.title: Avengers: Endgame
movie2.imageDescription: The Incredible Hulk (Mark Ruffalo) smiles and poses for photos with a group of children.

movie3.title: Pokemon Detective Pikachu
movie3.imageDescription: The yellow mouse-like Pokemon, Pikachu (Ryan Reynolds), sits on a bar stool and holds a cup of coffee. He is smiling, and wearing a Sherlock Holmes style hat.

movie4.title: Black Panther
movie4.imageDescription: T'Challa of Wakanda (Chadwick Boseman) sits on a stylish throne, wearing a regal outfit of black and purple.

movie5.title: Sherlock
movie5.imageDescription: Sherlock Holmes (Benedict Cumberbatch) and John Watson (Martin Freeman) pose confidently in front of the London skyline.
